Question
========

The *"double-blind placebo controlled experiment with random allocation "* is the standard design in research on the efficacy of drugs. Which of the features of this design is most difficult to implement in intervention research on the efficacy of psychotherapy?

Answerlist
----------

* The random assignment aspect.
* The double-blind aspect.
* The placebo control.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* The random assignment..: Incorrect
* The double-blind aspect...: Incorrect
* The placebo control: Correct
